## Ingredients:

*Makes 4 waffles*

-   1/2 cup Almond flour
-   1/4 cup Flour
-   1/2 tsp Baking powder
-   2 eggs
-   2 tbsp Greek yoghurt
-   2-3 tsp sugar (to taste)

## Method:

1.  Combine all ingredients together well
2.  Cook on waffle iron and enjoy!
